attributes.action: Raise the level at which Inheritance Tax is payable to £500,000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the value of household properties has increased at a far greater rate than inflation over the past few years, I feel that the current level is too low and suggest it be raised to £500,000.

rejection.details: there are already similar inheritance tax petitions on the site
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
